title: Gyaarah Gyaarah
overview: Three cops defy the rules of time to investigate and deliver justice in a series of cold cases. How far will they go as they work from within the corrupt system to bring the criminals to book?

tv.episodeOverview: In 1990, Palak, a dancer set to meet Shaurya, travels alone, only to encounter a driver named Brahmdutt.  In 2016, Yug awaits updates on Palakâ€™s murder case from Shaurya, only to be kept hanging.
